description: A light-hearted story of a programmer, Alex, and a computer, highlighting the humorous and supportive relationship between them.
title: Digital Support
n_1: Overwhelmed with work, Alex mutters about needing a break, while Computer processes silently.
n_2: In an attempt to be supportive, Computer changes its screen to a worried emoticon.
n_3: Computer humorously displays a pop-up message, 'Error 404: Relaxation Not Found'.
n_4: In the final scene, Alex relaxes, amused by Computer's supportive pop-up message.
c1_1: Maybe I should take a break.
c1_2: Are you trying to look worried?
c2_4: shows the final supportive error message
